summary: My background is in Information Technology and I have over 20 years experience working in the Aviation Ground Handling sector performing several IT roles. From Support to System Administration and most recently in Project Management

experience.title: Global IT Project Manager
experience.description: Based in Wood Dale, IL. Manage internal system around the global network; lead in-house Java Development Team delivering internal back-of-house solutions and customer-facing web portals; oversee regional support networks across four regions; gather business knowledge to provide requirements to Development Team; oversee UAT and live deployments; senior IT representative coordinating with parent company IT teams 24/7; involved in data centre transformation and migration to Enterprise Cloud Service with a third-party supplier.

experience.title: IT Project Manager
experience.description: Project management for IT infrastructure for green-field Station start-ups (Hyderabad and Bangalore 2007-2008); oversaw network, hardware acquisition and key systems go-live; contributed to UK and Europe expansion; managed IT systems for easyJet start-ups including Bristol (2009), Tenerife, Ibiza and Barcelona (2009).

experience.title: Support Analyst and System Administrator
experience.description: Led IT support in Global Cargo System deployment to Prague (2006); performed on-site/remote support; administered IT systems from Global Data Centre; provided PC support, network administration, Exchange server administration, and user inquiries.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Member of Ogden Cargo System and Support team; worked with UK Cargo terminals; contributed to ISO 9002 quality system; developed reports using IQ Objects BI tool for core Cargo Handling System.
